actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 23, title 38, United States Code, so as to provide that where death occurs in a State Home, the Administrator shall pay the actual cost (not to exceed $250) of the burial and funeral, and transport the body to the place of burial in the same or any other State.

summary.text: Directs the administrator of Veterans' Affairs to provide that where the death of a veteran occurs in a State Home for which the veteran was admitted for domiciliary, nursing, or specified hospital care, the Administrator shall pay the actual cost (not to exceed $250) of the burial and funeral.

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 23, title 38, United States Code, so as to provide that where death occurs in a State Home, the Administrator shall pay the actual cost (not to exceed $250) of the burial and funeral, and transport the body to the place of burial in the same or any other State.
